ARABIC: وَءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلْنَٰهُ هُدًى لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَلَّا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ مِن دُونِى وَكِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave Musa the Book and made it guidance for the tribe of Israel: 'Do not take anyone besides Me as a guardian.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We gave Moses the Book, and made it a guidance for the children of Israel that they should not take another protector apart from Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We gave Moses the Book, and made it a source of guidance for the Children of Israel, commanding: "Take no other Guardian beside Me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To Moses We gave the Book and made it a guide for the children of Israel, so that they would not have any one as their guardian other than Me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We gave Moosa the Book, and made it a guidance for the Descendants of Israel that, “Do not appoint anyone as a Trustee besides Me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We gave Musa the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel (saying): "Take none other than Me as (your) Wakil."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We gave Musa the Book and made it a guidance to the children of Israel, saying: Do not take a protector besides Me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We gave Moses the Book, and made it a guidance to the Children of Israel: 'Take not unto yourselves any guardian apart from Me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We gave unto Moses the Scripture, and We appointed it a guidance for the children of Israel, saying: Choose no guardian beside Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave Moses the Book and made it a guide for the Children of Israel saying, "Do not take anyone besides Me as a guardian,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We vouchsafed unto Musa the Book and We appointed it as a guidance to the Children of Isra'il: take not beside Me a trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We gave Moses the Book, and made it a guide for the Children of Israel—[saying,] ‘Do not take any trustee besides Me’—
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We gave Moses the Book, and made it a Guide to the Children of Israel, (commanding): "Take not other than Me as Disposer of (your) affairs."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel (saying): "Take not other than Me as (your) Wakil (Protector, Lord, or Disposer of your affairs, etc).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We gave Moses the Book and made it a guide for the Children of Israel. 'Take no guardian other than Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We gave Moses the Scripture, and made it a guide for the Children of Israel: Take none for protector other than Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel that you not take other than Me as Disposer of affairs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:2] God, exalted be He, says: And We gave Moses the Scripture, the Torah, and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel [saying] that they should not choose beside Me any guardian, to whom they delegate their affairs (a variant reading [for yattakhidhū, ‘they should [not] choose’] is tattakhidhū, ‘you should [not] choose’, thus turning away [from the third person address], in which case [the particle] an, ‘that’, is extra and the ‘saying’ is implicit).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We gave unto Moses the Scripture) We gave Moses the Torah in one instalment, (and We appointed it a guidance for the Children of Israel) from error, (saying: Choose) worship (no guardian) no lord (beside Me).
